Name: Viet Anh has a new chef

Content.summary: 'Viet Anh has a new chef' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Viet Anh Cafe, official, chef, Hospitality Recreation written on 15 August 2006
Content.tags: Viet Anh Cafe, official, chef, Hospitality Recreation
Content.bodyText: I went back to the Viet Anh Cafe on Saturday. The chef has changed and the stock is now anything but week. I'd say it has gone up to a three maybe even and three and a half, but I need to take my partner in crime back to give a new 'official' rating and take some photos.
